title: Continuous drop-in-biofuel production from pretreated sugarcane bagasse in Microwave-Visible irradiated continuous stirred slurry reactor: Reaction kinetics & techno-enviro-economic sustainability analyses
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00250D, Paper
Open Access

Sourav Barman, Rajat Chakraborty
This work utilizes an innovative microwave-visible irradiated continuous stirred slurry reactor (MWVIS-CSSR) for eco-friendly and cost-effective continuous production of a drop-in-biofuel, namely, ethyl levulinate (EL), from pretreated sugarcane bagasse (PSCB)....
